Here at Medicare & Medicaid Advisory Group, we know that each situation merits its own unique approach.
Medicare & Medicaid Advisory Group does not represent any particular caretaking facility, insurance plan, agency, etc. Instead, we represent people; a loving spouse, a devoted son or daughter, a caring relative, or even a close friend—Our purpose is to protect families and their legacies.

When it comes to protecting data, we assure our clients and those enquiring the utmost care and discretion in our handling of their data. All client information we receive is HIPPA-compliant. Any company that deals with protected health information must ensure that all required physical, network, and process security measures are in place and followed. HIPPA, or the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act, sets the standard for protecting patients’ sensitive data.
